title: Supervisor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rehire (Night): Choose an Unseen player. Their role will be rerolled to a random Unseen role in their subalignment. Cannot target the Mastermind or Assassin.
- Executive Power (Any Phase, 3 use): Choose an Unseen role not in the game. You may use one of their abilities. You may only use day abilities during the day and night abilities at night.
- Trade Secrets (Night, 1 use): Choose a Town role. You may use one of their night abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may Rehire yourself. If you do this, you will rehire yourself into a random non-Power/Head Unseen role.
- You may not use any Unseen Power roles, Unseen Head roles, or any roles that violate rule 16 with Executive Power.
- You have the same restrictions as Manager when using Trade Secrets.
